meanings.sent1: The nonblack cat had white fur.
meanings.sent2: She wore a nonblack dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The nonblack shoes clashed with his black suit.
meanings.sent4: The nonblack sky was filled with stars.
meanings.sent5: The nonblack car stood out among the black vehicles.

meanings.definition: A person who is not black in race or ethnicity.
meanings.sent1: The school had a mix of black and nonblack students.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her nonblack heritage.
meanings.sent3: The nonblack friend made everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, she stood out as the only nonblack person.
meanings.sent5: The team welcomed the new nonblack member with open arms.
